rows.label: tlk42360111_02_msg0001
rows.name: Have you ever played Clattertongue, mo?

rows.label: tlk42360111_02_msg0002
rows.name:
It's a board game everyone in this wheelhouse
is hooked on, mo.

rows.label: tlk42360111_02_msg0003
rows.name:
You collect materials placed on each map,
then exchange the materials for points, and the
first to get 20 points wins, mo!

rows.label: tlk42360111_02_msg0004
rows.name: By the way, Kajiji has 10 wins and 10 losses... mo.

rows.label: tlk42360111_02_msg0005
rows.name:
If you're interested,
you should buy it at Nopox Hobby Store, mo!
